## Report

### Summary of Work Completed

Successfully fixed responsive design issues in the Manual Comparison page:

**1. Fixed StageIndicator.tsx Mobile Label Duplication** (components/comparison/StageIndicator.tsx:69-73)
- Changed from CSS-based conditional visibility (`hidden` class) to React conditional rendering
- Mobile label now only renders when the stage is active (`{isActive && ...}`)
- Eliminated duplicate text issue where both hidden and visible states would render simultaneously
- Simplified className from multi-line ternary with `hidden` class to a single-line with direct `text-cyan-600`

**2. Added Responsive Sidebar Visibility** (components/layout/Sidebar.tsx:35)
- Added `hidden md:flex` classes to the main sidebar container
- Sidebar now hides on mobile/tablet viewports (< 768px breakpoint)
- Sidebar displays on desktop viewports (≥ 768px breakpoint)
- Maintains existing flex layout structure for proper display

**3. Verified MainLayout Compatibility** (components/layout/MainLayout.tsx)
- Confirmed existing `flex-1` class on main content div properly handles responsive behavior
- Main content automatically expands to full width when sidebar is hidden on mobile
- No changes required to MainLayout

**4. Validation Complete**
- ✓ TypeScript type checking passed
- ✓ ESLint validation passed
- ✓ Production build successful (compiled in 1479ms)
